name: Guns&slime
description:
You are playing as slime, and must absorb bullets to prevent hitting target!

Slime can only jump, and to do this, click in the direction you want to jump. also, you absorb  bullets when jump. After you absorb bullet, you have +1 score. after some time will spawn more enemies and targets, and slime stay bigger!

it`s my first game for gamejam :)
